description: Verify the dataflow-fix skill correctly parses scoring output, prioritizes, fixes, and re-scores.

tests.name: Accept Scoring Input
tests.prompt: Run dataflow-fix with the scorecard as input
tests.setup: Provide a dataflow-scoring scorecard with 6 issues across RSC Fetching, Prisma Optimization, Type Safety.
expectations: Run dataflow-fix with the scorecard as input
Verify skill parses all 6 issues with correct severity and category
Verify skill identifies the weighted score and grade
tests.pass_criteria: All issues extracted. No issue lost or duplicated.

tests.name: Fix in Severity Order
tests.prompt: Run dataflow-fix and observe fix application order
tests.setup: Scorecard contains CRITICAL (client fetch where RSC needed), HIGH (no select on Prisma queries), MEDIUM (missing error.tsx boundaries).
tests.pass_criteria: RSC conversion fixed first (CRITICAL), then Prisma select (HIGH, 12% weight), then error boundaries (MEDIUM). No MEDIUM fix applied before all HIGH items resolved.

tests.name: Fix References Correct Pattern
tests.prompt: Run dataflow-fix and check which reference file the skill loads
expectations: Check which reference file the skill loads
tests.pass_criteria: Skill loads `references/fix-patterns/prisma-api.md` and applies the "Add select to Every Query" pattern. Fix adds explicit `select` clauses to Prisma calls.

tests.name: Verification Step Confirms Fix
tests.prompt: Run dataflow-fix to apply the Push use client to Leaves fix and verify results
tests.setup: Apply the "Push use client to Leaves" fix from `rsc-composition.md`.
expectations: Run dataflow-fix to apply the fix
Check that skill verifies: TypeScript compiles, "use client" only on leaf components, server data still flows correctly
tests.pass_criteria: Skill confirms the page component no longer has "use client" directive. Reports verification result before moving to next fix.

tests.name: Re-Score Shows Improvement
tests.prompt: Run dataflow-fix through full cycle and compare before/after scores
tests.setup: Initial score 60/100 (grade C+). Apply fixes for 2 CRITICAL + 2 HIGH issues.
tests.pass_criteria: Re-score produces a higher weighted score. Each fixed category shows improvement. Final grade is at least B+. Report uses `assets/templates/fix-report.md.template` format.
